content: जडता, --त्वं {@--1@} Dulness, aversion to work, slothfulness. {@--2@} Ignorance, stupidity; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) Dulness, regarded as one of the 33 subordinate feelings; <ls>S. D. 175.</ls> {@--4@} Stupefaction, numbness, stupor; <ls>U. 3. 12.</ls> {@--5@} Dulness, timidity; <ls>Māl. 6. 15.</ls>
